name: Kelp (itch) (peterfiftyfour, hey-its-mel, Parastou)
description:
Made in <48 hours for the Regenerate Game Jam!

A curious scientist finds out about the importance of seaweed for the climate. They go on a journey to create a seafood farm to help regenerate the ocean's life and fight climate change. Take care of your magical seaweed garden by harvesting seaweed, removing pollution, and collecting information

You can: 

- Place seaweed on the floor and on the Kelp ropes. 

- Keep your garden clean by removing pollution.

- Find the 5 kelp fragments to collect information. 

Controls:

[WASD] to move, [Space] to go up, [Control] to go down. [Left Click] to plant seaweed, [Right click] to interact

Credits: 

Development: Peter (peterfiftyfour.itch.io), Blue (https://itch.io/profile/bloobyjoobyjoob) 

Art: Min (www.instagram.com/min.creative) 

UI/UX: Melody (www.instagram.com/meli_melody) 

Concept: Parastou (https://parastou.itch.io/) 

Music: Leina (https://reinbel.com/)
